item.title: Released Hamas hostage says Trump can bring home those still captive in Gaza
item.description: Keith Siegel urged the US president to pressure both Israel and Hamas to agree a new ceasefire and hostage release deal.

item.title: Israel says it struck Houthi-held ports and cargo ship in Yemen
item.description: The Israeli military says the strikes were a response to attacks by the Houthis, who later launched two missiles towards Israel and the occupied West ...

item.title: Pictures of beef Wellington used in mushroom murders released by court
item.description: An Australian woman has been found guilty by a jury of murdering three relatives with a deadly family lunch.

item.title: Two reported dead in Kenya protests as central Nairobi sealed off
item.description: These are the latest in a wave of anti-government protests over the past year.

item.title: South Africa's police minister accused of links to criminal gangs
item.description: A provincial police chief accuses the minister of trying to prevent investigations into political killings.
